metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3488 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Processing of repeated responses to the same query, where both responsescontain ECS pseudo-options, but where the first is broken in some way, cancause BIND to exit with an assertion failure. 'Broken' in this context isanything that would cause the resolver to reject the query response, suchas a mismatch between query and answer name. This issue affects BIND 9versions 9.11.4-S1 through 9.11.37-S1 and 9.16.8-S1 through 9.16.36-S1.

criterions.comment: bind9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
